name: Business Case Template
description: Professional template for creating comprehensive business case documents with structured sections for executive summary, objectives, benefits analysis, and risk assessment.
content:
# Business Case Template

## Executive Summary

## Problem Statement

## Proposed Solution

## Benefits Analysis

## Cost Analysis

## Risk Assessment

## Implementation Plan

## Conclusion
aiInstructions: Generate a comprehensive business case following the template structure. Focus on clear problem definition, quantifiable benefits, and realistic implementation timeline.

name: Requirements Specification Template
description: Comprehensive template for documenting functional and non-functional requirements with priority classification and acceptance criteria.
content:
# Requirements Specification

## Introduction

## Scope

## Functional Requirements

## Non-Functional Requirements

## User Stories

## Acceptance Criteria

## Assumptions and Constraints

## Glossary
aiInstructions: Create detailed requirements specification focusing on measurable, testable requirements. Include user perspectives and acceptance criteria for each requirement.

name: Test Plan Template
description: Structured template for comprehensive test planning including test strategy, test cases, and quality assurance processes.
content:
# Test Plan

## Test Strategy

## Test Scope

## Test Cases

## Test Environment

## Test Schedule

## Resource Requirements

## Risk Analysis

## Exit Criteria
aiInstructions: Develop comprehensive test plan covering all aspects of quality assurance. Include both manual and automated testing approaches with clear success criteria.

name: System Design Document Template
description: Technical template for documenting system architecture, component design, interfaces, and implementation details.
content:
# System Design Document

## Architecture Overview

## System Components

## Data Design

## Interface Design

## Security Considerations

## Performance Requirements

## Deployment Architecture

## Appendices
aiInstructions: Create detailed technical design document with focus on scalability, maintainability, and security. Include architectural diagrams and component specifications.

name: Release Notes Template
description: Template for documenting software releases including new features, bug fixes, breaking changes, and upgrade instructions.
content:
# Release Notes v{VERSION}

## What's New

## Features

## Bug Fixes

## Breaking Changes

## Upgrade Instructions

## Known Issues

## Support Information
aiInstructions: Generate clear and comprehensive release notes that help users understand changes and upgrade safely. Include impact assessment for breaking changes.
